content:
I have PR #11314 open which tries to fix issue #4240
by adding a different animation for when messages are edited. I'd like to hear what everyone thinks about how it looks, there's two windows so it's clear how it appears for the user editing and for other people seeing the message that gets edited. Animation is slightly less exact when actually submitted:
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33805964/52807593-f3415300-30b1-11e9-9b4b-3e58b242e4f1.gif
@Yash RE Can you describe briefly what it's doing, or what to look for that's different than the current way we do it?

Right, I see how that would be helpful, currently we have no animation for when the edit box opens and closes, this means that it looks strange when you open an edit in between many messages and either submit it or cancel it. What this does is add an animation for that which is a combination of a slide in as well as a fade in. The change for topic edits is also similar, I'll upload a gif of how it currently looks in a moment.

I agree with the issue that the way we have it right now is a bit jarring, especially in comparison to how it is when we send a new message.
current.gif
@Yash RE I agree it's jarring.
